properties.name: SIE Global Headquarters
properties.type: Reviewed by Billy: Beautiful impressive building, great architecture that blends perfectly with the PlayStation devices! Cafeteria is awesome and every table has a nice TV to watch your favorite movie or program and there is an area to play with all the available PS, so definitively a cool place to visit if you are allowed to enter or work if you are passionate about the consoles and gaming in general, plus location is great close to a nice lake where you can go for a walk during lunch time. California SIE Family!
properties.location: 2207 Bridgepointe Parkway, San Mateo, CA 94404, US
properties.facts: Right across a plaza which includes: BJ's Restaurant, Target, and Bed Bath & Beyond
properties.imageCaption: SIE Global Headquarters in San Mateo, California, U.S.

properties.name: SIE Waterloo Office
properties.type: Looking for career opportunities at PlayStation? PlayStation is hiring people for various job listings. Explore PlayStation job openings, work ethics, career benefits and much more. Apply Now!
properties.location: 180 King St S, Waterloo, ON N2J 1P8, Canada
properties.facts: Right across the Waterloo Adult Recreation Centre.
properties.imageCaption: Building seen from outside the SIE Waterloo office

properties.name: SIE Berlin Office
properties.type: Not only does each of us work together to bring incredible PlayStation experiences to life for players across the world, but we have the great fortune of doing this work alongside dedicated, creative, talented people from every walk of life. All of us share the goal of making PlayStation the best place to play. - Jim Ryan
properties.facts: In an office building on Wilhelmstraße
properties.imageCaption: Building seen from outside the SIE Berlin office

properties.name: Sony City
properties.facts: The building in was completed in 2006 Japan's Sony Family!

properties.name: SIE Australia Office
properties.type: By building a culture of creativity and innovation, we are not only encouraging major companies to South Australia, we are giving young students who want to work in this field the ability to stay here in SA and not have to travel interstate for these types of exciting opportunities.
properties.facts: Located across a small park in Hindmarsh Square.
properties.imageCaption: Image of the outside ground level of SIE Berlin's office

properties.name: SIE Singapore Office
properties.type: The new organization structure and set up of Asia hub in Singapore will be leading the Asia teams to continuously expand the PlayStation business with their extensive working experience and business knowledge. We have confidence to further reinforce its business and operational strength to continue to spearhead and remain the leader in the constantly evolving business environment.
properties.facts: Located in Central Mall next to Qantas Airways.
properties.imageCaption: Bottom floor of SIE Singapore's office near airway

properties.name: London Studios
properties.type: Sony London Studio is leading the charge in building AAA VR games—our vision is to become the World’s Best AAA VR Games Developer—and, with our most recent release, Blood & Truth, we’ve taken a bold step forward towards this ambitious vision.
properties.location: Great Marlborough St, Soho, London W1F 7HR, United Kingdom

properties.name: Insomniac Games
properties.type: Sony Spent $229 Million To Acquire Insomniac Games, Developer Of 'Ratchet & Clank' And 'Spider-Man
properties.facts: Located across the street of Fairfield Marriott
properties.imageCaption: Building seen from outside Insomniac Games
